meanings.definition: To inquire about something by posing a question.
meanings.sent1: I will ask my teacher for help with my homework.
meanings.sent2: Can I ask you a question about the assignment?
meanings.sent3: Why did the chicken ask the egg how it was feeling?
meanings.sent4: The curious child's eyes seemed to ask a thousand questions.
meanings.sent5: She asked the stars for guidance in the dark night sky.

meanings.sent1: I will ask my mom for a snack after school.
meanings.sent2: He asked his friend to borrow a pencil for the test.
meanings.sent3: The cat asked the dog for a turn on the comfy cushion.
meanings.sent4: The flowers seemed to ask the sun for more warmth.
meanings.sent5: She asked the genie for three wishes to come true.

meanings.definition: To invite someone to do something.
meanings.sent1: I will ask my friend to join me for a walk in the park.
meanings.sent2: They asked their neighbors to come over for a barbecue.
meanings.sent3: The birthday girl asked her guests to dance with her.
meanings.sent4: The ocean waves seemed to ask the seagulls to play along.
meanings.sent5: She asked the birds to sing along with her in the morning.
